title: What is the volume of pesticide sales in the EU?
subtitle: Sales of pesticides in the EU reached a relative low of about 292 000 tonnes in 2023 and declined by 8.8% in comparison to 2022.
textNote: Malta is not visualized as pesticide sales are 3 tonnes. Following pesticide categories are visualized fungicides and bactericides, herbicides, haulm destructors and moss killers, insecticides and acaricides, molluscicides, plant growth regulators, other plant protection products.
